caption.p: Histopathological examination of brain tissues of the experimental rats.

Legend: Group 1 (normal control): Neurons appeared normal, Group 2 (venom control): neuronal degeneration and necrosis, Group 3 (antivenom control): no visible lesion, Group 4(venom/300 mg/kg n-hexane): No visible lesion, Group 5 (venom/600 mg/kg n-hexane): No visible lesion, Group 6(venom/300 mg/kg ethylacetate): severe congestion of the meninges, Group 7(venom/600 mg/kg ethylacetate): No visible lesion, Group 8(venom/300 mg/kg ethanol): No visible lesion, Group 9(venom/600 mg/kg ethanol):severe congestion of the meninges. H - hematoxylin, E − eosin.
